amend-postcode.label: Postcode (optional)
amend-postcode.hint: Postcode is optional if your address is outside the UK

amend-country.label: Country of address
amend-country.hint: Select a country from the list

amend-phone-number.label: Contact phone number
amend-phone-number.hint: For international numbers, include the country code

amend-email.label: Email address
amend-email.hint: Where we will contact you about the outcome of your application

amend-name-options.legend: Do you need to amend your name on the licence?

amend-new-date-name-changed.legend: What date did you change your name?

amend-applicant-Id-type.legend: Which identity document do you want to use?
amend-applicant-Id-type.hint: If your licence is granted, you will need to show this document when buying the substances

EU-passport.label: Passport from the EU, Switzerland, Norway, Iceland or Liechtenstein

amend-Uk-driving-licence-number.label: What is your driving licence number?
amend-Uk-driving-licence-number.hint: On section 5 of your licence, for example MORGA657054SM9IJ

amend-new-postcode.label: Postcode (optional)
amend-new-postcode.hint: Postcode is optional if your address is outside the UK

amend-new-date-moved-to-address.legend: What date did you change your address?
